item.title: Apache Camel features spotlight: Cluster Service
item.description: In Apache Camel 2.20.0 we have introduced an initial support for native clustering named Camel Cluster Service for which my colleague Nicola Ferraro has wrote a really nice post about how to use this feature to create singleton services on Kubernetes [1], here we are going to talk a little bit more about how the service works. Concepts Cluster Service is a regular camel service that runs in background and is responsible to manage cluster objects.
